name: When Rabbits Get Guns
description:
When Rabbits Get Guns is a game made for the Rustic Jam.

In this game you take control of a rabbit hellbent on taking revenge on those responsible for an attack on his warren.

The game is playable in browser but I have also included a offline version as a downloadable zip. To run this version unzip the folder and run/execute 'nw.exe'

Controls:

WASD - Movement

Left Mouse Button - Fire

Right Mouse Button - Throw Grenade

E - Interact

Mouse Scroll Wheel - Change Weapon
